p:
Performing a 60-min-long tubulin polymerisation assay a direct effect of 12a has been demonstrated on microtubule formation. The significant increase in V max induced by our test compound is similar to the effects of other oestrone derivatives from D-secoalcohol
25 and D-secoestrone-triazole
15 series. However, another ring A substituted cytotoxic oestradiol analogue, 2-methoxyestradiol, has been reported to inhibit tubulin polymerisation
26 . This result is suitable for providing evidence about the final effect of our test compound on tubulin-microtubule system.
